## Initialization

```{r}
library(jiebaR)
library(jiebaRD)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(wordcloud2)
```

## Segmentation

```{r}
data = read.csv("jiayuan.csv")
seg_line = worker(type = "query", bylines = TRUE, stop_word = "stop_word.txt", user = "user_dict.txt")
results_line = segment(data$content,seg_line)
seg_all = worker(type = "query", stop_word = "stop_word.txt", user = "user_dict.txt")
results_all = segment(data$content,seg_all)
```


## Frequency

```{r}
freq_all = freq(results_all)
freq_all = freq_all[order(freq_all$freq, decreasing = TRUE), ]
wordcloud2(freq_all[1:1000,])
```

```{r}
dict = readLines("user_dict.txt")
freq_all[freq_all$char %in% dict,]
```
